title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 1st to 7th July 2023
instruction: Recently (July 2023), the SCO Summit 2023 (23rd Summit of the SCO Council of Heads of State), under India’s first-ever SCO Chairmanship was hosted virtually by India. After SCO Summit, Indian Foreign Secretary Vinay Kwatra in a special briefing said, "Iran is now a member. __________ is set to become a full member by 2024. As of now, there are 14 other dialogue partners in SCO. There are also three observers.”

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Prime Minister has launched the National Sickle Cell Anaemia Elimination Mission in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh.Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to National Sickle Cell Anaemia Elimination Mission?1.      Target year to eliminate sickle cell Anaemia is 2027.2.      4 Main components of the Mission are Screening, Prevention, Treatment and Research.3.      Sickle Cell Anaemia is a genetic disorder that affects the shape and function of white blood cells (WBCs).4.      Mission has a target of screening approximately 7.0 crore people under 40 years of age in the next 3 years (from the fiscal year 2023-24 to 2025-26).
options: 1 and 4
2 and 4
2 and 3
1, 2, 3 and 4
Only 4

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), National Water Mission (NWM), Bureau of Water Use Efficiency (BWUE) & Indian Plumbing Association (IPA) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU). The MoU envisages to achieve the Goal-4 of National Water Mission which is increasing the water use efficiency by ____________.
options: 10%
50%
20%
30%
40%

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Online Training Module on the Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children Act) 2015 has been inaugurated and launched.Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Online Training Module?1.      It has been developed by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment in collaboration with the LBSNAA, Mussoorie.2.      It has been inaugurated and launched on the Karmayogi Igot platform.3.      It aims at sensitization and capacity building of all functionaries who need to be aware of the provisions for child safety, protection and welfare right up to the village level.
options: 1 and 3
1 only
3 only
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘Prohibition of Employment as Manual Scavengers and their Rehabilitation Act, 2013’?1.      One Time Cash Assistance of Rs. 10,000 is given under the act.2.      The Act bans the use of any individual for manually cleaning, carrying, disposing of or otherwise handling in any manner, human excreta till its disposal.3.      Municipalities are now responsible for identifying and rehabilitating manual scavengers.
options: 1 and 2
2 only
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, Department of Telecommunication has announced the formation of the Bharat 6G Alliance (B6GA). A grant of ________ under the Telecom Technology Development Fund (TTDF) has been allocated to support the advancement of 6G technology.
options: Rs 240.51 crores
Rs 540.51 crores
Rs 440.51 crores
Rs 340.51 crores
None of the above

quiz.text: In addition to the grant under the Telecom Technology Development Fund (TTDF), two agreements were signed for projects, first one being ‘6G THz Testbed with Orbital Angular Momentum (OAM) & multiplexing’ through consortium of which of the following entities?
options: SAMEER
IIT Madras
IIT Patna
IIT Guwahati
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Union Minister of Ports, Shipping & Waterways has launched the campaign to transform iconic __________ lighthouses into tourism destinations.
options: 75
200
100
125
150

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Prime Minister has inaugurated the 17th Indian Cooperative Congress on the theme ‘AmritKaal: Prosperity through Cooperation for a Vibrant India. Cooperative sector has a share of about __________ in agriculture credit distribution.
options: 35%
25%
29%
15%
30%

quiz.text: What would come in place of _____(A)____, in the above paragraph?
options: World Bank eGovernment Survey
UN eGovernment Survey
IMF E-Survey
World Economic Forum Survey
Reserve Bank of India Survey

quiz.text: Which of the following options will fill ____(B)_____ in the above paragraph?
options: biennially
annually
twice a year
every quarter
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), DoT (Dept. of Telecommunication), in collaboration with MYGOV, has celebrated “Bharat Internet Utsav”. The data cost in India has been reduced to almost _________.
options: Rs.20/GB
Rs.15/GB
Rs.5/GB
Rs.10/GB
Rs.25/GB

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), a 3-Day International Conference on Green Hydrogen begins has been held in New Delhi. As per the information shared at the conference, _________ has conveyed their intent to provide $20–$25 billion over five years to aid India’s aspirations for green growth.
options: World Bank
Asian Development Bank
European Investment Bank
New Development Bank
Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank

quiz.text: As per the information shared at the conference, ________of power generation capacity of India today is based on non-fossil-fuels.
options: 52%
48%
54%
42%
59%

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Startup20 Gurugram Summit has concluded with resounding success, India has passed the Torch to Brazil. __________ has become the first country to extend support towards $1 Trillion Milestone for global Startups per annum by 2030.
options: Germany
India
UAE
Brazil
Saudi Arabia

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, SWAMIH fund is sponsored by the ____________.
options: Ministry of Finance
World Bank
European Investment Bank
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
3 and 4

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the eligibility of projects to receive SWAMIH funding?
options: Projects must be very close to completion.
RERA-registered projects which have been stalled due to a lack of adequate funds.
Flats that do not measure more than 500 square metres in carpet area.
Flats that are priced up to INR 2 crore in the Mumbai Metropolitan Region.
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, which of the following country is set to rejoin UNESCO after 5 years?
options: Sudan
Syria
United States
Saudi Arabia
Russia

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, which of the following would fill the ___’X’_____?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Telangana
Chandigarh
Delhi
Jammu & Kashmir

quiz.text: _______ is the nodal agency for the implementation of Tele-MANAS and _______ is the technology partner.
options: NIMHANS; IIT Madras
NIMHANS; IIIT Bengaluru
NHSRS; IIT Madras
NHSRS; IIIT Bengaluru
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the World Bank’s Board of Executive Directors has approved __________ in financing to accelerate India’s development of low-carbon energy.
options: USD 1 billion
USD 2.5 billion
USD 2 billion
USD 5 billion
USD 1.5 billion

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), which of the following agencies have launched a priority research agenda to better advocate for increased research and investment in antimicrobial resistance (AMR)?
options: Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO)
United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
World Health Organization (WHO) AMR Division
World Organisation for Animal Health (WOAH, founded as OIE)
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), India has joined the Champions Group of the Global Crisis Response Group (GCRG). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to GCRG?1.      It was established in March 2022.2.      GCRG was set up by the World Bank.3.      The GCRG is overseen by the Champions Group comprising of HOS/ HOGs of Bangladesh, Barbados, Denmark, Germany, Indonesia and Senegal.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, __________ is set to become a full member by 2024.
options: Bangladesh
Japan
Belarus
Syria
Egypt
